content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":27757,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/574dd06f-2e3f-4a64-8507-95c5b820be33/Capture.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/574dd06f-2e3f-4a64-8507-95c5b820be33/Capture.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture.JPG\",\"name\":\"Capture.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"574dd06f-2e3f-4a64-8507-95c5b820be33\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":566,\"height\":330},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Finding an apartment for foreigners is a non-trivial and rather difficult task.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are 3 main ways to find a property in Poland:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1. Contacting one of the real estate agencies (a constantly updated list of recommendations from employees) - most of the apartments, even from private owners, are rented through realtors who take care of all the issues related to registration and signing of the lease agreement and other formalities.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Pros: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You save time, don't need much knowledge on how to rent and spend less time. You may also find properties arranged better by involving agencies\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cons:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" The price is likely to be higher than the market price and the agency will ask for 70%-100% of the fee\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. Reach out to colleagues who change a rented apartment for a private reason (family growth, office changes, etc.) and post an ad about their previous apartment in social media or the Epam Expat community.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Pros:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" You may save on the services of a realtor, \\\"insider\\\" information about the apartment. Give feedback on the owner from a person who speaks your native language. Most likely the apartment is near the office\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cons: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The number of options is small, the price may be higher than the current market price but negotiation may help\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3. Find ads on one of the aggregator sites on your own (in many cases it will also be an agent).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Pros:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" the choice will be much greater, the price is lower, and savings on the services of a realtor\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cons: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This type of deal is risky and you need to be aware of all details of the renting process as well as documents signed\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-warning\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Note: If you are not fully confident you can rent an apartment without help, we strongly recommend using a real estate agent or service at least when signing the final lease. The cost of services is usually one monthly payment.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
